sentences.en: a condition which affects the nerves in the back
Alistair saw Henry shrink, as if the words had touched a nerve.
sentences.cn: 阿利斯泰尔看到亨利向后缩了一下，好像那些话触到了他的痛处。

sentences.en: Every nerve in her body was tense.
sentences.cn: 她的每一根神经都绷得紧紧的。

sentences.en: It takes a lot of nerve to report a colleague for sexual harassment.
sentences.cn: 要举报同事的性骚扰行为需要很大的勇气。

sentences.en: It was more nerve-wracking than taking a World Cup penalty.
sentences.cn: 这比在世界杯上罚点球还扣人心弦。

sentences.en: Lately he'd been making mistakes; his nerve was beginning to go.
sentences.cn: 他近来老犯错误，胆子也开始变小了。

sentences.en: Malcolm worked up the nerve to ask Grandma Rose for some help.
sentences.cn: 马尔科姆鼓起勇气请罗丝奶奶帮点忙。

sentences.en: My office is the nerve centre of the operation.
sentences.cn: 我的办公室是此次行动的控制中心。

sentences.en: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed.
sentences.cn: 如果受到损伤，神经细胞再造的能力有限。

sentences.en: Perhaps his nerve is naturally too dull to admit of any excitation.
sentences.cn: 大概他的神经天生就很迟钝以至不容有任何刺激的余地.

sentences.en: She finally found the nerve to tell him she wanted a divorce.
sentences.cn: 她终于鼓起勇气告诉他自己想离婚。

sentences.en: The brandy made him choke, but it restored his nerve.
sentences.cn: 虽说白兰地呛了他一下，却让他恢复了勇气。

sentences.en: The hands are richly supplied with nerve endings.
The mere mention of John had touched a very raw nerve indeed.
sentences.cn: 提到约翰就真的让人心痛。

sentences.en: The virus remains dormant in nerve tissue until activated.
sentences.cn: 病毒潜伏于神经组织里直到被激活。

sentences.en: They've got a nerve, complaining about our behaviour.
sentences.cn: 他们竟敢对我们的行为表示不满。

sentences.en: We need to keep our nerve now.
sentences.cn: 我们现在需要保持镇静。

sentences.en: When he was with her, his nerve never let up.
sentences.cn: 和她在一起, 他总是感到很激动.

words.tran_cn: 神经的；紧张不安的；强健有力的
有勇气的；易激动的；紧张不安的
大胆地；强壮地；神经过敏地
神经质地；焦急地；提心吊胆地
神经质；[心理] 神经过敏；紧张不安

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)极端胆小的人；神经极度紧张的人
(非正式)使某人紧张不安；让某人心烦

phrases.phrase: live on one's nerves (或 one's nerve ends)
touch (或 hit) a nerve (或 a raw nerve)

trans.tran_cn: 神经，勇气，胆量，[植] 叶脉，中枢
trans.tran_en: nerves are parts inside your body which look like threads and carry messages between the brain and other parts of the body
to force yourself to be brave enough to do something
